name: Wildfire (itch) (DDT_404)
description:
The danger from flames and smoke is growing as blazes spread more swiftly and unpredictably as a consequence of climate change.

Try to experience the job of fireman and coordinate driving through forest and try to stop the fire.

Play through the environment made up of 3D scans from a forest in Staňkovice, Czech Republic.   

Controls:

Key arrows - Driving
V - Water gun
B - Water pump
